scripts.package: rm -rf dist-package && mkdir dist-package && cp src/index.html dist-package/index.html && sed -i -- 's/<script title="production-script" src="">/<script src="elements.js">/g' ./dist-package/index.html && cat dist/angular-elements/{polyfills,runtime,main}.js > dist-package/elements.js
scripts.package-for-github-pages: rm -rf docs && mkdir docs && cp src/index.html docs/index.html && sed -i -- 's/<script title="production-script" src="">/<script src="elements.js">/g' ./docs/index.html && cat dist/angular-elements/{polyfills,runtime,main}.js > docs/elements.js
scripts.generate-github-pages: npm run build-for-github-pages && npm run package-for-github-pages && sed -i -- 's/<base href="\/">/<base href="angular-elements">/g' ./docs/index.html && cp docs/index.html docs/404.html && rm -rf dist
